action.primary: Clears Heat, generates Fluids, invigorates the Blood and breaks up Blood Stasis

indications: Difficult urination, amenorrhea and constipation caused by Heat Accumulation
Jaundice, sores, abdominal masses and polydipsia caused by fever.

notes: This herb inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
This herb is said to clear accumulated Heat and subside inflammation.
It is said to cure a black complexion and facial sores.
It also treats leukorrhagia, menstrual disorders, dysphagia and abdominal distention.
It reduces swelling, cures jaundice and promotes lactation and menstruation.
Used alone, it is effective in easing pain caused by cancer.
